```{r}
library(terra)

coast <- vect("inputs/_ags_HELCOM_subbasins_with_coastal_and_offshore_divisio/HELCOM_subbasins_with_coastal_and_offshore_division_2022_level3.shp")
plot(coast)

grid <- rast(crs = crs(coast), extent = ext(coast), resolution = 250)
grid <- rasterize(coast, grid)
plot(grid)

writeRaster(grid, "outputs/grid_250m.tif", overwrite = TRUE)
```
